tr.td: DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.Rotavirus
Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
draft
WHO
computable

div.p: WHO recommendations for routine immunization â€“ summary tables (March 2023) (1)

tr.td:
Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination: Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
WHO recommends that the first dose of rotavirus vaccine be administered as soon as possible after 6 weeks of age.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with first rotavirus dose as client's age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for rotavirus vaccination: Client is due for rotavirus vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for rotavirus vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with first rotavirus dose as no rotavirus doses were administered, client's age is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination: Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with first rotavirus dose as live vaccine was administered in last 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for rotavirus vaccination: Client is due for rotavirus vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
A minimum interval of 4 weeks should be maintained between doses.
Note: The rotavirus vaccination series for each child should be completed with the same product whenever feasible. However, if the product used for a prior dose is unavailable or unknown, the series should be completed with any available licensed product.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for rotavirus vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with second rotavirus dose as client's age is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination: Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with second rotavirus dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for rotavirus vaccination: Client is due for rotavirus vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
For a mixed series or a series with any unknown vaccine products, a total of 3 doses of rotavirus vaccine should be administered for a complete vaccination series.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for rotavirus vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with third rotavirus dose as no live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks and series administered to client is a mixed or unknown series. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination: Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with third rotavirus dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks and series administered to client is a mixed or unknown series. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for rotavirus vaccination: Client is due for rotavirus vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
RotaTeq, Rotavac and Rotasiil should be administered in a 3-dose schedule, while a 2-dose schedule should be used for Rotarix.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for rotavirus vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with third rotavirus dose as series contains more than two doses and no live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination: Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with third rotavirus dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Rotavirus immunization schedule is complete: Rotavirus immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Rotavirus immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Rotavirus immunization schedule is complete. Two rotavirus doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Rotavirus immunization schedule is complete: Rotavirus immunization schedule is complete '"Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"
â€“
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Rotavirus immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Rotavirus immunization schedule is complete. Three rotavirus primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination if immunization schedule is not complete.: Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination if immunization schedule is not complete. "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" IF current "Immunization recommendation status" â‰ "Complete"
Because of the typical age distribution of rotavirus gastroenteritis, rotavirus vaccination of children aged over 24 months is not recommended.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination if immunization schedule is not complete.
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with rotavirus dose as client's age is more than 24 months. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
